title: Noticeable delay on navigation to Wallet main screen (more than 1s)
body:
***Type***: Bug

***Summary***: There is a noticiable lag when user navigates to Wallet main screen from Home or Profile screens. It takes 5-6 times more comparing to navigation on Home or Profile screens. 
Despite the number of assets enabled in Wallet (means it's almost the same with 1 token or 30 tokens enabled on Wallet): 
- On iPhoneX (powerful device) it's almost instant with any screen. 
- On Galaxy J7 (Android8.1), - not the weakest device but anyway, - there is ~1s delay when navigate from Home/Profile to Wallet screen


#### Expected behavior
Delay is the same and less than 0.3s when user navigates between main mobile app screens (Home -> Profile -> Wallet -> Profile -> Wallet)
#### Actual behavior
When user navigates from Profile / Home screens to Wallet screen -> delay is less than 0.3s

### Reproduction

- Open Status
- Create new account
- Navigate from Home screen to Profile and note the time Profile screen loads (Note: should be <0.3s)
- Navigate from Profile screen to Home and note the time Home screen loads (Note: should be <0.3s)
- Navigate from Home screen to Wallet screen


### Additional Information
* Status version: Release 0.10.1, develop 0.11
* Operating System: Android and iOS

#### Logs

These are logs from logcat when user navigates from Home to Profile:
```
03-06 19:24:34.969  2916  2916 D ViewRootImpl@385121a[MainActivity]: ViewPostIme pointer 0
03-06 19:24:35.019  2916  2916 D ViewRootImpl@385121a[MainActivity]: ViewPostIme pointer 1
03-06 19:24:35.041  2916  3026 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:34] - Handling re-frame event:  :navigate-to
03-06 19:24:35.046  2916  3026 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.ui.screens.navigation:80] - :navigate-to :profile-stack
03-06 19:24:35.075  2916  3026 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.ui.screens.routing.core:23] - :on-will-focus :extensions-settings
03-06 19:24:35.078  2916  3026 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.ui.screens.routing.core:29] - :on-did-focus :extensions-settings
03-06 19:24:35.091  2916  2916 D ViewRootImpl@385121a[MainActivity]: Relayout returned: old=[0,0][1080,1920] new=[0,0][1080,1920] result=0x1 surface={valid=true 3415164928} changed=false
03-06 19:24:35.120  2916  3026 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:34] - Handling re-frame event:  :screens/on-will-focus
03-06 19:24:35.128  2916  3026 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.ui.screens.views:67] - :main-component-did-update :extensions-settings

```
Please note it takes ~0.15s for screen to load

These are logs from logcat when user navigates from Profile to Home(with 6 chats on screen):
```

```
It's also takes < 0.15s for screen to load.
And there are logs from logcat when user navigates from Home to Wallet(only ETH and SNT are present as assets):

```

```
Takes ~0.8-1s for Wallet screen to appera after user tap on Wallet button

on iPhone 5s, iOS 12.1.2 , nightly 0.11.0 (2019030708) from March 7 (no chats on Home screen, on Wallet - onboarding is done, so main Wallet screeen with default ETH and SNT assets are shown):

Home -> Profile (~0.05s)

@Serhy do you recall if this was with the old or new navigation (without or with DApps)? Looking to see if the issue is still relevant.

@hesterbruikman it was with and without separate DApp screen. In both cases apparently, something happens (requests to etherscan / fiat exchange rate request / redrawing Wallet screen not optimised / etc.) which produces delay upon navigation to main Wallet screen.

Confirmed issue still present in 0.12.0 `(20190418)` develop build.

➤ Hester Bruikman commented:

Wallet requests

Wallet needs loading states to show on navigation.

@serhy @yenda 

Can we close thuis issue? Believe @yenda 's performance improvements have resolved the delay.
@hesterbruikman It's not merged yet, waiting for QA
It was fixed. Closing this issue.
